title: 'Insectageddon' is 'alarmist by bad design': Scientists point out the study's major flaws

title_detail.value: 'Insectageddon' is 'alarmist by bad design': Scientists point out the study's major flaws

summary: Researchers in Finland have published a response to a recent scientific review predicting that as a result of an ongoing rapid decline, nearly half of the world's insects could soon go extinct. The authors point out major flaws in the earlier study and warn that it risks compromising the credibility of conservation science.
